title: Struggling With Niche Research? Try This Free KDP Tool!

tactics.name: Niche Research Tracker
tactics.description: A free tool to filter profitable niches using sales rank, reviews, and earnings data from KD Spy and Publisher Rocket
steps: Download the niche resource tracker from global self-publishing.com/resources
Input niche keywords into KD Spy and Publisher Rocket
Apply filters for sales rank <150,000, reviews <150, earnings >$1,000
Color-code results based on competitive score (green <50, yellow 50-75, red >75)
caveats: Tools may not detect niche saturation accurately
